```{r}
library(aggregator)
library(igraph)
library(visNetwork)
g = igraph::graph_from_adjacency_matrix(note_network)
```

```{r}
plot(g, layout=layout_with_fr(g))
# Too much text
```

```{r}
heatmap(note_network[,order(rowSums(note_network))])
# Not all rows are included?
```
```{r}
# Interactive
visNetwork(data.frame(id=colnames(note_network), 
                      label=substr(colnames(note_network), 1,15)), 
           as_data_frame(g))
```
